text.text:
The all-new Lone Peak 6 is here.

Updated and up for anything.

image.alt: Shot of rear portion of Altra Lone Peak 6, showing the Ego midsole.

customhtml2_copy_cop_229667436.customHTML:
FOAM FIT FOR ADVENTURE.

Our Altra EGOâ„¢ foam is designed to provide a responsive, yet soft, comfortable feel.

customhtml2_copy.customHTML:
GRIPPY TRACTION.
Our grippy Maxtracâ„¢ outsole provides the perfect combination of grip, traction, and durability on all types of terrain.

image.alt: Shot of top portion of Altra Lone Peak 6, showing the customizable lacing system.

customhtml2_copy_cop_229667436.customHTML:
NEW WAYS TO LACE UP.

The Lone Peak 6 is designed for a more secure fit with an updated upper construction and a new customizable lacing system

image.alt: Footshape overlay on man and woman trail running

customhtml2.customHTML:
MOVE NATURALLY.

Our Original FootShapeâ„¢ comfort gives your feet more space to sit naturally and is designed to address biological differences in men's and women's feet.

image.alt: Side-by-side image of Women's and Men's Altra Lone Peak 6
